mapper.insert: insert into img_item(img_num, img_photo, img_content, img_date, img_ban, img_price, img_category, id) values((SELECT NVL(MAX(img_num), 0) + 1 as img_num FROM img_item), #{img_photo}, #{img_content}, sysdate, #{img_ban}, #{img_price}, #{img_category}, #{id})
mapper.select: select img_photo, img_num,id from img_item order by img_num desc
select img_photo, img_content, img_date, img_like, img_price, img_category,img_viewcnt,id from img_item where img_num = #{img_num}
mapper.update: update img_item set img_viewcnt = img_viewcnt+1 where img_num =#{img_num}
